original: RV_04.001.01.1 tvāṃ hy agne sadam it samanyavo devāso devam aratiṃ nyerira iti kratvā nyerire
analyzed: tvām hi agne sadam id samanyavaḥ devāsaḥ devam aratim nyerire iti kratvā nyerire

original: RV_04.001.01.2 amartyaṃ yajata martyeṣv ā devam ādevaṃ janata pracetasaṃ viśvam ādevaṃ janata pracetasam
analyzed: amartyam yajata martyeṣu ā devam ā devam janata pracetasam viśvam ā devam janata pracetasam

original: RV_04.001.02.1 sa bhrātaraṃ varuṇam agna ā vavṛtsva devāṃ achā sumatī yajñavanasaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ yajñavanasam
analyzed: sa bhrātaram varuṇam agne ā vavṛtsva devān achā sumatī yajña vanasam jyeṣṭham yajña vanasam

original: RV_04.001.02.2 ṛtāvānam ādityaṃ carṣaṇīdhṛtaṃ rājānaṃ carṣaṇīdhṛtam
analyzed: ṛtāvānam ādityam carṣaṇī dhṛtam rājānam carṣaṇī dhṛtam

original: RV_04.001.03.1 sakhe sakhāyam abhy ā vavṛtsvāśuṃ na cakraṃ rathyeva raṃhyāsmabhyaṃ dasma raṃhyā
analyzed: sakhe sakhāyam abhī ā vavṛtsva āśum na cakram rathyā iva raṃhyā asmabhyam dasma raṃhyā

original: RV_04.001.03.2 agne mṛḷīkaṃ varuṇe sacā vido marutsu viśvabhānuṣu tokāya tuje śuśucāna śaṃ kṛdhy asmabhyaṃ dasma śaṃ kṛdhi
analyzed: agne mṛḷīkam varuṇe sacā vidaḥ marutsu viśva bhānuṣu tokāya tuje śuśucāna śam kṛdhi asmabhyam dasma śam kṛdhi

original: RV_04.001.04.1 tvaṃ no agne varuṇasya vidvān devasya heḷo 'va yāsisīṣṭhāḥ
analyzed: tvam naḥ agne varuṇasya vidvān devasya heḍaḥ vaḥ yāsisīṣṭhāḥ

original: RV_04.001.04.2 yajiṣṭho vahnitamaḥ śośucāno viśvā dveṣāṃsi pra mumugdhy asmat
analyzed: yajiṣṭhaḥ vahnitamaḥ śośucānaḥ viśvā dveṣāṃsi pra mumugdhi asmat

original: RV_04.001.05.1 sa tvaṃ no agne 'vamo bhavotī nediṣṭho asyā uṣaso vyuṣṭau
analyzed: sa tvam naḥ agne vamaḥ bhava ūtī nediṣṭhaḥ asyāḥ uṣasaḥ vyuṣṭau

original: RV_04.001.05.2 ava yakṣva no varuṇaṃ rarāṇo vīhi mṛḷīkaṃ suhavo na edhi
analyzed: ava yakṣva naḥ varuṇam rarāṇaḥ vīhi mṛḷīkam su havaḥ naḥ edhi

original: RV_04.001.06.1 asya śreṣṭhā subhagasya saṃdṛg devasya citratamā martyeṣu
analyzed: asya śreṣṭhā subhagasya saṃdṛś devasya citratamā martyeṣu

original: RV_04.001.06.2 śuci ghṛtaṃ na taptam aghnyāyā spārhā devasya maṃhaneva dhenoḥ
analyzed: śuci ghṛtam na taptam aghnyāyāḥ spārhā devasya maṃhanā iva dhenoḥ

original: RV_04.001.07.1 trir asya tā paramā santi satyā spārhā devasya janimāny agneḥ
analyzed: tris asya tā paramā santi satyā spārhā devasya janimāni agneḥ

original: RV_04.001.07.2 anante antaḥ parivīta āgāc chuciḥ śukro aryo rorucānaḥ
analyzed: anante antar parivītaḥ āgāt śuciḥ śukraḥ aryaḥ rorucānaḥ

original: RV_04.001.08.1 sa dūto viśved abhi vaṣṭi sadmā hotā hiraṇyaratho raṃsujihvaḥ
analyzed: sa dūtaḥ viśvā id abhi vaṣṭi sadmā hotā hiraṇya rathaḥ raṃsu jihvaḥ

original: RV_04.001.08.2 rohidaśvo vapuṣyo vibhāvā sadā raṇvaḥ pitumatīva saṃsat
analyzed: rohidaśvaḥ vapuṣyaḥ vibhāvā sadā raṇvaḥ pitumatī iva saṃsad

original: RV_04.001.09.1 sa cetayan manuṣo yajñabandhuḥ pra tam mahyā raśanayā nayanti
analyzed: sa cetayat manuṣaḥ yajña bandhuḥ pra tam mahyā raśanayā nayanti

original: RV_04.001.09.2 sa kṣety asya duryāsu sādhan devo martasya sadhanitvam āpa
analyzed: sa kṣeti asya duryāsu sādhan devaḥ martasya sa dhani tvam āpa

original: RV_04.001.10.1 sa tū no agnir nayatu prajānann achā ratnaṃ devabhaktaṃ yad asya
analyzed: sa tu naḥ agniḥ nayatu prajānan achā ratnam deva bhaktam yat asya

original: RV_04.001.10.2 dhiyā yad viśve amṛtā akṛṇvan dyauṣ pitā janitā satyam ukṣan
analyzed: dhiyā yat viśve amṛtāḥ akṛṇvan dyauḥ pitā janitā satyam ukṣan

original: RV_04.001.11.1 sa jāyata prathamaḥ pastyāsu maho budhne rajaso asya yonau
analyzed: sa jāyata prathamaḥ pastyāsu mahaḥ budhne rajasaḥ asya yonau

original: RV_04.001.11.b apād aśīrṣā guhamāno antāyoyuvāno vṛṣabhasya nīḷe
analyzed: a pāt a śīrṣā guhamānaḥ anta ayoyuvānaḥ vṛṣabhasya nīḍe

original: RV_04.001.12.1 pra śardha ārta prathamaṃ vipanyam ṛtasya yonā vṛṣabhasya nīḷe
analyzed: pra śardhaḥ ārta prathamam vipanyam ṛtasya yonā vṛṣabhasya nīḍe

original: RV_04.001.12.2 spārho yuvā vapuṣyo vibhāvā sapta priyāso 'janayanta vṛṣṇe
analyzed: spārhaḥ yuvā vapuṣyaḥ vibhāvā sapta priyāsaḥ janayanta vṛṣṇe

original: RV_04.001.13.1 asmākam atra pitaro manuṣyā abhi pra sedur ṛtam āśuṣāṇāḥ
analyzed: asmākam atra pitaraḥ manuṣyāḥ abhi pra seduḥ ṛtam āśuṣāṇāḥ

original: RV_04.001.13.2 aśmavrajāḥ sudughā vavre antar ud usrā ājann uṣaso huvānāḥ
analyzed: aśma vrajāḥ sudughāḥ vavre antar ud usrāḥ ājan uṣasaḥ huvānāḥ

original: RV_04.001.14.1 te marmṛjata dadṛvāṃso adriṃ tad eṣām anye abhito vi vocan
analyzed: te marmṛjata dadṛvāṃsaḥ adrim tat eṣām anye abhitas vi vocan

original: RV_04.001.14.2 paśvayantrāso abhi kāram arcan vidanta jyotiś cakṛpanta dhībhiḥ
analyzed: paśu ayantrāsaḥ abhi kāram arcan vidanta jyotiḥ cakṛpanta dhībhiḥ

original: RV_04.001.15.1 te gavyatā manasā dṛdhram ubdhaṃ gā yemānam pari ṣantam adrim
analyzed: te gavyatā manasā dṛdhram ubdham gāḥ yemānam pari santam adrim

original: RV_04.001.15.2 dṛḷhaṃ naro vacasā daivyena vrajaṃ gomantam uśijo vi vavruḥ
analyzed: dṛḍham naraḥ vacasā daivyena vrajam gomantam uśijaḥ vi vavruḥ

original: RV_04.001.16.1 te manvata prathamaṃ nāma dhenos triḥ sapta mātuḥ paramāṇi vindan
analyzed: te manvata prathamam nāma dhenoḥ tris sapta mātuḥ paramāṇi vindan

original: RV_04.001.16.2 taj jānatīr abhy anūṣata vrā āvir bhuvad aruṇīr yaśasā goḥ
analyzed: tat jānatīḥ abhī anūṣata vrāḥ āvis bhuvat aruṇīḥ yaśasā goḥ

original: RV_04.001.17.1 neśat tamo dudhitaṃ rocata dyaur ud devyā uṣaso bhānur arta
analyzed: neśat tamaḥ dudhitam rocata dyauḥ ud devyāḥ uṣasaḥ bhānuḥ arta

original: RV_04.001.17.2 ā sūryo bṛhatas tiṣṭhad ajrām ṛju marteṣu vṛjinā ca paśyan
analyzed: ā sūryaḥ bṛhataḥ tiṣṭhat ajrām ṛju marteṣu vṛjinā ca paśyan

original: RV_04.001.18.1 ād it paścā bubudhānā vy akhyann ād id ratnaṃ dhārayanta dyubhaktam
analyzed: āt id paścā bubudhānāḥ vi akhyan āt id ratnam dhārayanta dyu bhaktam

original: RV_04.001.18.2 viśve viśvāsu duryāsu devā mitra dhiye varuṇa satyam astu
analyzed: viśve viśvāsu duryāsu devāḥ mitra dhiye varuṇa satyam astu

original: RV_04.001.19.1 achā voceya śuśucānam agniṃ hotāraṃ viśvabharasaṃ yajiṣṭham
analyzed: achā voceya śuśucānam agnim hotāram viśva bharasam yajiṣṭham

original: RV_04.001.19.2 śucy ūdho atṛṇan na gavām andho na pūtam pariṣiktam aṃśoḥ
analyzed: śuci ūdhaḥ atṛṇat na gavām andhaḥ na pūtam pariṣiktam aṃśoḥ

original: RV_04.001.20.1 viśveṣām aditir yajñiyānāṃ viśveṣām atithir mānuṣāṇām
analyzed: viśveṣām aditiḥ yajñiyānām viśveṣām atithiḥ mānuṣāṇām

original: RV_04.001.20.2 agnir devānām ava āvṛṇānaḥ sumṛḷīko bhavatu jātavedāḥ
analyzed: agniḥ devānām avaḥ āvṛṇānaḥ su mṛḍīkaḥ bhavatu jātavedāḥ

original: RV_04.002.01.1 yo martyeṣv amṛta ṛtāvā devo deveṣv aratir nidhāyi
analyzed: yaḥ martyeṣu amṛtaḥ ṛtāvā devaḥ deveṣu aratiḥ nidhāyi

original: RV_04.002.01.2 hotā yajiṣṭho mahnā śucadhyai havyair agnir manuṣa īrayadhyai
analyzed: hotā yajiṣṭhaḥ mahnā śucadhyai havyaiḥ agniḥ manuṣaḥ īrayadhyai

original: RV_04.002.02.1 iha tvaṃ sūno sahaso no adya jāto jātāṃ ubhayāṃ antar agne
analyzed: iha tvam sūno sahasaḥ naḥ adya jātaḥ jātām ubhayān antar agne

original: RV_04.002.02.2 dūta īyase yuyujāna ṛṣva ṛjumuṣkān vṛṣaṇaḥ śukrāṃś ca
analyzed: dūtaḥ īyase yuyujānaḥ ṛṣvaḥ ṛju muṣkān vṛṣaṇaḥ śukrān ca

original: RV_04.002.03.1 atyā vṛdhasnū rohitā ghṛtasnū ṛtasya manye manasā javiṣṭhā
analyzed: atyā vṛdhasnū rohitā ghṛtasnū ṛtasya manye manasā javiṣṭhā

original: RV_04.002.03.2 antar īyase aruṣā yujāno yuṣmāṃś ca devān viśa ā ca martān
analyzed: antar īyase aruṣā yujānaḥ yuṣmān ca devān viśaḥ ā ca martān

original: RV_04.002.04.1 aryamaṇaṃ varuṇam mitram eṣām indrāviṣṇū maruto aśvinota
analyzed: aryamaṇam varuṇam mitram eṣām indrāviṣṇū marutaḥ aśvinā uta

original: RV_04.002.04.2 svaśvo agne surathaḥ surādhā ed u vaha suhaviṣe janāya
analyzed: su aśvaḥ agne su rathaḥ su rādhāḥ ā id u vaha su haviṣe janāya

original: RV_04.002.05.1 gomāṃ agne 'vimāṃ aśvī yajño nṛvatsakhā sadam id apramṛṣyaḥ
analyzed: gomān agne vimān aśvī yajñaḥ nṛvat sakhā sadam id apramṛṣyaḥ

original: RV_04.002.05.2 iḷāvāṃ eṣo asura prajāvān dīrgho rayiḥ pṛthubudhnaḥ sabhāvān
analyzed: iḷāvān eṣaḥ asura prajāvān dīrghaḥ rayiḥ pṛthu budhnaḥ sabhāvān

original: RV_04.002.06.1 yas ta idhmaṃ jabharat siṣvidāno mūrdhānaṃ vā tatapate tvāyā
analyzed: yaḥ te idhmam jabharat siṣvidānaḥ mūrdhānam vā tatapate tvāyā

original: RV_04.002.06.2 bhuvas tasya svatavāṃḥ pāyur agne viśvasmāt sīm aghāyata uruṣya
analyzed: bhuvaḥ tasya svatavān pāyuḥ agne viśvasmāt sīm aghāyataḥ uruṣya

original: RV_04.002.07.1 yas te bharād anniyate cid annaṃ niśiṣan mandram atithim udīrat
analyzed: yaḥ te bharāt anniyate cit annam niśiṣat mandram atithim udīrat

original: RV_04.002.07.2 ā devayur inadhate duroṇe tasmin rayir dhruvo astu dāsvān
analyzed: ā devayuḥ inadhate duroṇe tasmin rayiḥ dhruvaḥ astu dāsvān

original: RV_04.002.08.1 yas tvā doṣā ya uṣasi praśaṃsāt priyaṃ vā tvā kṛṇavate haviṣmān
analyzed: yaḥ tvā doṣā yaḥ uṣasi praśaṃsāt priyam vā tvā kṛṇavate haviṣmān

original: RV_04.002.08.2 aśvo na sve dama ā hemyāvān tam aṃhasaḥ pīparo dāśvāṃsam
analyzed: aśvaḥ na sve dame ā hemyāvān tam aṃhasaḥ pīparaḥ dāśvāṃsam

original: RV_04.002.09.1 yas tubhyam agne amṛtāya dāśad duvas tve kṛṇavate yatasruk
analyzed: yaḥ tubhyam agne amṛtāya dāśat duvaḥ tve kṛṇavate yata sruc

original: RV_04.002.09.2 na sa rāyā śaśamāno vi yoṣan nainam aṃhaḥ pari varad aghāyoḥ
analyzed: na sa rāyā śaśamānaḥ vi yoṣat na enam aṃhaḥ pari varat aghāyoḥ

original: RV_04.002.10.1 yasya tvam agne adhvaraṃ jujoṣo devo martasya sudhitaṃ rarāṇaḥ
analyzed: yasya tvam agne adhvaram jujoṣaḥ devaḥ martasya sudhitam rarāṇaḥ

original: RV_04.002.10.2 prīted asad dhotrā sā yaviṣṭhāsāma yasya vidhato vṛdhāsaḥ
analyzed: prītā id asat hotrā sā yaviṣṭhā āsāma yasya vidhataḥ vṛdhāsaḥ

original: RV_04.002.11.1 cittim acittiṃ cinavad vi vidvān pṛṣṭheva vītā vṛjinā ca martān
analyzed: cittim acittim cinavat vi vidvān pṛṣṭhā iva vītā vṛjinā ca martān

original: RV_04.002.11.2 rāye ca naḥ svapatyāya deva ditiṃ ca rāsvāditim uruṣya
analyzed: rāye ca naḥ su apatyāya deva ditim ca rāsvā aditim uruṣya

original: RV_04.002.12.1 kaviṃ śaśāsuḥ kavayo 'dabdhā nidhārayanto duryāsv āyoḥ
analyzed: kavim śaśāsuḥ kavayaḥ dabdhāḥ nidhārayantaḥ duryāsu āyoḥ

original: RV_04.002.12.2 atas tvaṃ dṛśyāṃ agna etān paḍbhiḥ paśyer adbhutāṃ arya evaiḥ
analyzed: atas tvam dṛśyām agne etān paḍbhiḥ paśyeḥ adbhutām aryaḥ evaiḥ

original: RV_04.002.13.1 tvam agne vāghate supraṇītiḥ sutasomāya vidhate yaviṣṭha
analyzed: tvam agne vāghate su praṇītiḥ suta somāya vidhate yaviṣṭha

original: RV_04.002.13.2 ratnam bhara śaśamānāya ghṛṣve pṛthu ścandram avase carṣaṇiprāḥ
analyzed: ratnam bhara śaśamānāya ghṛṣve pṛthu ścandram avase carṣaṇi prāḥ

original: RV_04.002.14.1 adhā ha yad vayam agne tvāyā paḍbhir hastebhiś cakṛmā tanūbhiḥ
analyzed: adhā ha yat vayam agne tvāyā paḍbhiḥ hastebhiḥ cakṛma tanūbhiḥ

original: RV_04.002.14.2 rathaṃ na kranto apasā bhurijor ṛtaṃ yemuḥ sudhya āśuṣāṇāḥ
analyzed: ratham na krantaḥ apasā bhurijoḥ ṛtam yemuḥ sudhyaḥ āśuṣāṇāḥ

original: RV_04.002.15.1 adhā mātur uṣasaḥ sapta viprā jāyemahi prathamā vedhaso nṝn
analyzed: adhā mātuḥ uṣasaḥ sapta viprāḥ jāyemahi prathamāḥ vedhasaḥ nṝn

original: RV_04.002.15.2 divas putrā aṅgiraso bhavemādriṃ rujema dhaninaṃ śucantaḥ
analyzed: divaḥ putrāḥ aṅgirasaḥ bhavema adrim rujema dhaninam śucantaḥ

original: RV_04.002.16.1 adhā yathā naḥ pitaraḥ parāsaḥ pratnāso agna ṛtam āśuṣāṇāḥ
analyzed: adhā yathā naḥ pitaraḥ parāsaḥ pratnāsaḥ agne ṛtam āśuṣāṇāḥ

original: RV_04.002.16.2 śucīd ayan dīdhitim ukthaśāsaḥ kṣāmā bhindanto aruṇīr apa vran
analyzed: śucī id ayan dīdhitim uktha śāsaḥ kṣāmā bhindantaḥ aruṇīḥ apa vran

original: RV_04.002.17.1 sukarmāṇaḥ suruco devayanto 'yo na devā janimā dhamantaḥ
analyzed: su karmāṇaḥ su rucaḥ devayantaḥ yaḥ na devāḥ janimā dhamantaḥ

original: RV_04.002.17.2 śucanto agniṃ vavṛdhanta indram ūrvaṃ gavyam pariṣadanto agman
analyzed: śucantaḥ agnim vavṛdhantaḥ indram ūrvam gavyam pariṣadantaḥ agman

original: RV_04.002.18.1 ā yūtheva kṣumati paśvo akhyad devānāṃ yaj janimānty ugra
analyzed: ā yūthā iva kṣumati paśvaḥ akhyat devānām yat janimānti ugra

original: RV_04.002.18.2 martānāṃ cid urvaśīr akṛpran vṛdhe cid arya uparasyāyoḥ
analyzed: martānām cit urvaśīḥ akṛpran vṛdhe cit aryaḥ uparasya āyoḥ

original: RV_04.002.19.1 akarma te svapaso abhūma ṛtam avasrann uṣaso vibhātīḥ
analyzed: akarma te su apasaḥ abhūma ṛtam avasran uṣasaḥ vibhātīḥ

original: RV_04.002.19.2 anūnam agnim purudhā suścandraṃ devasya marmṛjataś cāru cakṣuḥ
analyzed: anūnam agnim purudhā su ścandram devasya marmṛjataḥ cāru cakṣuḥ

original: RV_04.002.20.1 etā te agna ucathāni vedho 'vocāma kavaye tā juṣasva
analyzed: etā te agne ucathāni vedhaḥ vocāma kavaye tā juṣasva

original: RV_04.002.20.2 uc chocasva kṛṇuhi vasyaso no maho rāyaḥ puruvāra pra yandhi
analyzed: ud śocasva kṛṇuhi vasyasaḥ naḥ mahaḥ rāyaḥ puru vāra pra yandhi

original: RV_04.003.01.1 ā vo rājānam adhvarasya rudraṃ hotāraṃ satyayajaṃ rodasyoḥ
analyzed: ā vaḥ rājānam adhvarasya rudram hotāram satya yajam rodasyoḥ

original: RV_04.003.01.2 agnim purā tanayitnor acittād dhiraṇyarūpam avase kṛṇudhvam
analyzed: agnim purā tanayitnoḥ acittāt hiraṇya rūpam avase kṛṇudhvam

original: RV_04.003.02.1 ayaṃ yoniś cakṛmā yaṃ vayaṃ te jāyeva patya uśatī suvāsāḥ
analyzed: ayam yoniḥ cakṛma yam vayam te jāyā iva patye uśatī su vāsāḥ

original: RV_04.003.02.2 arvācīnaḥ parivīto ni ṣīdemā u te svapāka pratīcīḥ
analyzed: arvācīnaḥ parivītaḥ ni sīda imāḥ u te svapāka pratīcīḥ

original: RV_04.003.03.1 āśṛṇvate adṛpitāya manma nṛcakṣase sumṛḷīkāya vedhaḥ
analyzed: āśṛṇvate a dṛpitāya manma nṛ cakṣase su mṛḷīkāya vedhaḥ

original: RV_04.003.03.2 devāya śastim amṛtāya śaṃsa grāveva sotā madhuṣud yam īḷe
analyzed: devāya śastim amṛtāya śaṃsa grāvā iva sotā madhuṣut yam īḍe

original: RV_04.003.04.1 tvaṃ cin naḥ śamyā agne asyā ṛtasya bodhy ṛtacit svādhīḥ
analyzed: tvam cit naḥ śamyāḥ agne asyāḥ ṛtasya bodhi ṛta cit svādhīḥ

original: RV_04.003.04.2 kadā ta ukthā sadhamādyāni kadā bhavanti sakhyā gṛhe te
analyzed: kadā te ukthā sadhamādyāni kadā bhavanti sakhyā gṛhe te

original: RV_04.003.05.1 kathā ha tad varuṇāya tvam agne kathā dive garhase kan na āgaḥ
analyzed: kathā ha tat varuṇāya tvam agne kathā dive garhase kad naḥ āgaḥ

original: RV_04.035.02.2 sukṛtyayā yat svapasyayā caṃ ekaṃ vicakra camasaṃ caturdhā
analyzed: su kṛtyayā yat su apasyayā cam ekam vicakra camasam caturdhā

original: RV_04.035.03.1 vy akṛṇota camasaṃ caturdhā sakhe vi śikṣety abravīta

original: RV_04.035.03.2 athaita vājā amṛtasya panthāṃ gaṇaṃ devānām ṛbhavaḥ suhastāḥ

original: RV_04.035.04.2 athā sunudhvaṃ savanam madāya pāta ṛbhavo madhunaḥ somyasya

original: RV_04.035.05.1 śacyākarta pitarā yuvānā śacyākarta camasaṃ devapānam
analyzed: śacyā akarta pitarā yuvānā śacyā akarta camasam deva pānam

original: RV_04.035.05.2 śacyā harī dhanutarāv ataṣṭendravāhāv ṛbhavo vājaratnāḥ
analyzed: śacyā harī dhanutarau ataṣṭa indra vāhau ṛbhavaḥ vāja ratnāḥ

original: RV_04.035.06.1 yo vaḥ sunoty abhipitve ahnāṃ tīvraṃ vājāsaḥ savanam madāya
analyzed: yaḥ vaḥ sunoti abhipitve ahnām tīvram vājāsaḥ savanam madāya

original: RV_04.035.06.2 tasmai rayim ṛbhavaḥ sarvavīram ā takṣata vṛṣaṇo mandasānāḥ
analyzed: tasmai rayim ṛbhavaḥ sarva vīram ā takṣata vṛṣaṇaḥ mandasānāḥ

original: RV_04.035.07.1 prātaḥ sutam apibo haryaśva mādhyaṃdinaṃ savanaṃ kevalaṃ te
analyzed: prātar sutam apibaḥ hari aśva mādhyaṃdinam savanam kevalam te

original: RV_04.035.07.2 sam ṛbhubhiḥ pibasva ratnadhebhiḥ sakhīṃr yāṃ indra cakṛṣe sukṛtyā

original: RV_04.035.08.1 ye devāso abhavatā sukṛtyā śyenā ived adhi divi niṣeda
analyzed: ye devāsaḥ abhavata su kṛtyā śyenāḥ iva id adhi divi niṣeda

original: RV_04.035.08.2 te ratnaṃ dhāta śavaso napātaḥ saudhanvanā abhavatāmṛtāsaḥ
analyzed: te ratnam dhāta śavasaḥ napātaḥ saudhanvanāḥ abhavata amṛtāsaḥ

original: RV_04.035.09.1 yat tṛtīyaṃ savanaṃ ratnadheyam akṛṇudhvaṃ svapasyā suhastāḥ
analyzed: yat tṛtīyam savanam ratna dheyam akṛṇudhvam su apasyā su hastāḥ

original: RV_04.035.09.2 tad ṛbhavaḥ pariṣiktaṃ va etat sam madebhir indriyebhiḥ pibadhvam
analyzed: tat ṛbhavaḥ pariṣiktam vaḥ etat sam madebhiḥ indriyebhiḥ pibadhvam

original: RV_04.036.01.1 anaśvo jāto anabhīśur ukthyo rathas tricakraḥ pari vartate rajaḥ

original: RV_04.036.02.1 rathaṃ ye cakruḥ suvṛtaṃ sucetaso 'vihvarantam manasas pari dhyayā

original: RV_04.036.02.2 tāṃ ū nv asya savanasya pītaya ā vo vājā ṛbhavo vedayāmasi

original: RV_04.036.03.1 tad vo vājā ṛbhavaḥ supravācanaṃ deveṣu vibhvo abhavan mahitvanam

original: RV_04.036.03.2 jivrī yat santā pitarā sanājurā punar yuvānā carathāya takṣatha

original: RV_04.036.04.1 ekaṃ vi cakra camasaṃ caturvayaṃ niś carmaṇo gām ariṇīta dhītibhiḥ

original: RV_04.036.04.2 athā deveṣv amṛtatvam ānaśa śruṣṭī vājā ṛbhavas tad va ukthyam
analyzed: athā deveṣu amṛta tvam ānaśa śruṣṭī vājāḥ ṛbhavaḥ tat vaḥ ukthyam

original: RV_04.036.05.2 vibhvataṣṭo vidatheṣu pravācyo yaṃ devāso 'vathā sa vicarṣaṇiḥ

original: RV_04.036.06.1 sa vājy arvā sa ṛṣir vacasyayā sa śūro astā pṛtanāsu duṣṭaraḥ

original: RV_04.036.06.2 sa rāyas poṣaṃ sa suvīryaṃ dadhe yaṃ vājo vibhvām ṛbhavo yam āviṣuḥ

original: RV_04.036.07.1 śreṣṭhaṃ vaḥ peśo adhi dhāyi darśataṃ stomo vājā ṛbhavas taṃ jujuṣṭana

original: RV_04.036.07.2 dhīrāso hi ṣṭhā kavayo vipaścitas tān va enā brahmaṇā vedayāmasi

original: RV_04.036.08.1 yūyam asmabhyaṃ dhiṣaṇābhyas pari vidvāṃso viśvā naryāṇi bhojanā
analyzed: yūyam asmabhyam dhiṣaṇābhyaḥ pari vidvāṃsaḥ viśvā naryāṇi bhojanā

original: RV_04.036.08.2 dyumantaṃ vājaṃ vṛṣaśuṣmam uttamam ā no rayim ṛbhavas takṣatā vayaḥ

original: RV_04.036.09.1 iha prajām iha rayiṃ rarāṇā iha śravo vīravat takṣatā naḥ

original: RV_04.036.09.2 yena vayaṃ citayemāty anyān taṃ vājaṃ citram ṛbhavo dadā naḥ
analyzed: yena vayam citayema ati anyān tam vājam citram ṛbhavaḥ dada naḥ

original: RV_04.037.01.1 upa no vājā adhvaram ṛbhukṣā devā yāta pathibhir devayānaiḥ
analyzed: upa naḥ vājāḥ adhvaram ṛbhukṣāḥ devāḥ yāta pathibhiḥ deva yānaiḥ

original: RV_04.037.01.2 yathā yajñam manuṣo vikṣv āsu dadhidhve raṇvāḥ sudineṣv ahnām
analyzed: yathā yajñam manuṣaḥ vikṣu āsu dadhidhve raṇvāḥ sudineṣu ahnām

original: RV_04.037.02.1 te vo hṛde manase santu yajñā juṣṭāso adya ghṛtanirṇijo guḥ
analyzed: te vaḥ hṛde manase santu yajñāḥ juṣṭāsaḥ adya ghṛta nirṇijaḥ guḥ

original: RV_04.037.02.2 pra vaḥ sutāso harayanta pūrṇāḥ kratve dakṣāya harṣayanta pītāḥ

original: RV_04.037.03.1 tryudāyaṃ devahitaṃ yathā va stomo vājā ṛbhukṣaṇo dade vaḥ
analyzed: tri udāyam deva hitam yathā vaḥ stomaḥ vājāḥ ṛbhukṣaṇaḥ dade vaḥ

original: RV_04.037.03.2 juhve manuṣvad uparāsu vikṣu yuṣme sacā bṛhaddiveṣu somam
analyzed: juhve manuṣvat uparāsu vikṣu yuṣme sacā bṛhaddiveṣu somam

original: RV_04.037.04.1 pīvoaśvāḥ śucadrathā hi bhūtāyaḥśiprā vājinaḥ suniṣkāḥ

original: RV_04.037.05.1 ṛbhum ṛbhukṣaṇo rayiṃ vāje vājintamaṃ yujam
analyzed: ṛbhum ṛbhukṣaṇaḥ rayim vāje vājintamam yujam

original: RV_04.037.05.2 indrasvantaṃ havāmahe sadāsātamam aśvinam
analyzed: indrasvantam havāmahe sadā sātamam aśvinam

analyzed: sa id ṛbhavaḥ yam avatha yūyam indraḥ ca martyam

original: RV_04.037.06.2 sa dhībhir astu sanitā medhasātā so arvatā

original: RV_04.037.07.1 vi no vājā ṛbhukṣaṇaḥ pathaś citana yaṣṭave

original: RV_04.037.07.2 asmabhyaṃ sūraya stutā viśvā āśās tarīṣaṇi
analyzed: asmabhyam sūrayaḥ stutāḥ viśvāḥ āśāḥ tarīṣaṇi

original: RV_04.037.08.1 taṃ no vājā ṛbhukṣaṇa indra nāsatyā rayim

original: RV_04.037.08.2 sam aśvaṃ carṣaṇibhya ā puru śasta maghattaye

analyzed: uta vājinam puru niṣṣidhvānam dadhikrām u dadathuḥ viśvakṛṣṭim

analyzed: yaḥ sma ārundhānaḥ gadhyā samatsu sanutaraḥ carati goṣu gachan

original: RV_04.038.04.2 āvirṛjīko vidathā nicikyat tiro aratim pary āpa āyoḥ
analyzed: āvirṛjīkaḥ vidathā nicikyat tiras aratim pari āpaḥ āyoḥ

original: RV_04.038.05.1 uta smainaṃ vastramathiṃ na tāyum anu krośanti kṣitayo bhareṣu
analyzed: uta smā enam vastramathim na tāyum anu krośanti kṣitayaḥ bhareṣu

original: RV_04.038.05.2 nīcāyamānaṃ jasuriṃ na śyenaṃ śravaś cāchā paśumac ca yūtham
analyzed: nīcāyamānam jasurim na śyenam śravaḥ ca achā paśumat ca yūtham

original: RV_04.038.06.1 uta smāsu prathamaḥ sariṣyan ni veveti śreṇibhī rathānām
analyzed: uta smāsu prathamaḥ sariṣyan ni veveti śreṇibhiḥ rathānām

original: RV_04.038.06.2 srajaṃ kṛṇvāno janyo na śubhvā reṇuṃ rerihat kiraṇaṃ dadaśvān
analyzed: srajam kṛṇvānaḥ janyaḥ na śubhvā reṇum rerihat kiraṇam dadaśvān

original: RV_04.038.07.1 uta sya vājī sahurir ṛtāvā śuśrūṣamāṇas tanvā samarye
analyzed: uta sya vājī sahuriḥ ṛtāvā śuśrūṣamāṇaḥ tanvā samarye

original: RV_04.038.07.2 turaṃ yatīṣu turayann ṛjipyo 'dhi bhruvoḥ kirate reṇum ṛñjan
analyzed: turam yatīṣu turayan ṛjipyaḥ dhi bhruvoḥ kirate reṇum ṛñjan

original: RV_04.038.08.1 uta smāsya tanyator iva dyor ṛghāyato abhiyujo bhayante
analyzed: uta sma asya tanyatoḥ iva dyoḥ ṛghāyataḥ abhiyujaḥ bhayante

original: RV_04.038.08.2 yadā sahasram abhi ṣīm ayodhīd durvartuḥ smā bhavati bhīma ṛñjan
analyzed: yadā sahasram abhi sīm ayodhīt durvartuḥ smā bhavati bhīmaḥ ṛñjan

original: RV_04.038.09.1 uta smāsya panayanti janā jūtiṃ kṛṣṭipro abhibhūtim āśoḥ
analyzed: uta sma asya panayanti janāḥ jūtim kṛṣṭipraḥ abhibhūtim āśoḥ

original: RV_04.038.09.2 utainam āhuḥ samithe viyantaḥ parā dadhikrā asarat sahasraiḥ
analyzed: uta enam āhuḥ samithe viyantaḥ parā dadhikrāḥ asarat sahasraiḥ

original: RV_04.038.10.1 ā dadhikrāḥ śavasā pañca kṛṣṭīḥ sūrya iva jyotiṣāpas tatāna
analyzed: ā dadhikrāḥ śavasā pañca kṛṣṭīḥ sūryaḥ iva jyotiṣā apaḥ tatāna

original: RV_04.038.10.2 sahasrasāḥ śatasā vājy arvā pṛṇaktu madhvā sam imā vacāṃsi
analyzed: sahasra sāḥ śata sāḥ vājī arvā pṛṇaktu madhvā sam imā vacāṃsi

original: RV_04.039.01.1 āśuṃ dadhikrāṃ tam u nu ṣṭavāma divas pṛthivyā uta carkirāma
analyzed: āśum dadhikrām tam u nu stavāma divaḥ pṛthivyāḥ uta carkirāma

original: RV_04.039.01.2 uchantīr mām uṣasaḥ sūdayantv ati viśvāni duritāni parṣan
analyzed: uchantīḥ mām uṣasaḥ sūdayantu ati viśvāni duritāni parṣan

original: RV_04.039.02.1 mahaś carkarmy arvataḥ kratuprā dadhikrāvṇaḥ puruvārasya vṛṣṇaḥ
analyzed: mahaḥ carkarmi arvataḥ kratu prāḥ dadhikrāvṇaḥ puru vārasya vṛṣṇaḥ

original: RV_04.039.02.2 yam pūrubhyo dīdivāṃsaṃ nāgniṃ dadathur mitrāvaruṇā taturim
analyzed: yam pūrubhyaḥ dīdivāṃsam nā agnim dadathuḥ mitrāvaruṇā taturim

original: RV_04.039.03.1 yo aśvasya dadhikrāvṇo akārīt samiddhe agnā uṣaso vyuṣṭau
analyzed: yaḥ aśvasya dadhikrāvṇaḥ akārīt samiddhe agnau uṣasaḥ vyuṣṭau

original: RV_04.039.03.2 anāgasaṃ tam aditiḥ kṛṇotu sa mitreṇa varuṇenā sajoṣāḥ
analyzed: anāgasam tam aditiḥ kṛṇotu sa mitreṇa varuṇena sajoṣāḥ

original: RV_04.039.04.1 dadhikrāvṇa iṣa ūrjo maho yad amanmahi marutāṃ nāma bhadram
analyzed: dadhikrāvṇaḥ iṣaḥ ūrjaḥ mahaḥ yat amanmahi marutām nāma bhadram

original: RV_04.039.04.2 svastaye varuṇam mitram agniṃ havāmaha indraṃ vajrabāhum
analyzed: svastaye varuṇam mitram agnim havāmahe indram vajra bāhum

original: RV_04.039.05.1 indram ived ubhaye vi hvayanta udīrāṇā yajñam upaprayantaḥ
analyzed: indram iva id ubhaye vi hvayante udīrāṇāḥ yajñam upaprayantaḥ

original: RV_04.039.05.2 dadhikrām u sūdanam martyāya dadathur mitrāvaruṇā no aśvam
analyzed: dadhikrām u sūdanam martyāya dadathuḥ mitrāvaruṇā naḥ aśvam

original: RV_04.039.06.1 dadhikrāvṇo akāriṣaṃ jiṣṇor aśvasya vājinaḥ
analyzed: dadhikrāvṇaḥ akāriṣam jiṣṇoḥ aśvasya vājinaḥ

original: RV_04.039.06.2 surabhi no mukhā karat pra ṇa āyūṃṣi tāriṣat
analyzed: surabhi naḥ mukhā karat pra naḥ āyūṃṣi tāriṣat

original: RV_04.040.01.1 dadhikrāvṇa id u nu carkirāma viśvā in mām uṣasaḥ sūdayantu
analyzed: dadhikrāvṇaḥ id u nu carkirāma viśvāḥ id mām uṣasaḥ sūdayantu

original: RV_04.040.01.2 apām agner uṣasaḥ sūryasya bṛhaspater āṅgirasasya jiṣṇoḥ
analyzed: apām agneḥ uṣasaḥ sūryasya bṛhaspateḥ āṅgirasasya jiṣṇoḥ

original: RV_04.040.02.1 satvā bhariṣo gaviṣo duvanyasac chravasyād iṣa uṣasas turaṇyasat
analyzed: satvā bhariṣaḥ gaviṣaḥ duvanyasad śravasyāt iṣaḥ uṣasaḥ turaṇyasad

original: RV_04.040.02.2 satyo dravo dravaraḥ pataṃgaro dadhikrāveṣam ūrjaṃ svar janat
analyzed: satyaḥ dravaḥ dravaraḥ pataṃgaraḥ dadhikrāvā iṣam ūrjam svar janat

original: RV_04.040.03.1 uta smāsya dravatas turaṇyataḥ parṇaṃ na ver anu vāti pragardhinaḥ
analyzed: uta sma asya dravataḥ turaṇyataḥ parṇam na veḥ anu vāti pragardhinaḥ

original: RV_04.040.03.2 śyenasyeva dhrajato aṅkasam pari dadhikrāvṇaḥ sahorjā taritrataḥ
analyzed: śyenasya iva dhrajataḥ aṅkasam pari dadhikrāvṇaḥ saha ūrjā taritrataḥ

original: RV_04.040.04.1 uta sya vājī kṣipaṇiṃ turaṇyati grīvāyām baddho apikakṣa āsani
analyzed: uta sya vājī kṣipaṇim turaṇyati grīvāyām baddhaḥ apikakṣe āsani

original: RV_04.040.04.2 kratuṃ dadhikrā anu saṃtavītvat pathām aṅkāṃsy anv āpanīphaṇat
analyzed: kratum dadhikrāḥ anu saṃtavītvat pathām aṅkāṃsi anu āpanīphaṇat

original: RV_04.054.01.2 vi yo ratnā bhajati mānavebhyaḥ śreṣṭhaṃ no atra draviṇaṃ yathā dadhat
analyzed: vi yaḥ ratnā bhajati mānavebhyaḥ śreṣṭham naḥ atra draviṇam yathā dadhat

original: RV_04.054.02.1 devebhyo hi prathamaṃ yajñiyebhyo 'mṛtatvaṃ suvasi bhāgam uttamam
analyzed: devebhyaḥ hi prathamam yajñiyebhyaḥ mṛta tvam suvasi bhāgam uttamam

original: RV_04.054.02.2 ād id dāmānaṃ savitar vy ærṇuṣe 'nūcīnā jīvitā mānuṣebhyaḥ
analyzed: āt id dāmānam savitar vi rṇuṣe nūcīnā jīvitā mānuṣebhyaḥ

original: RV_04.054.03.1 acittī yac cakṛmā daivye jane dīnair dakṣaiḥ prabhūtī pūruṣatvatā
analyzed: acittī yat cakṛma daivye jane dīnaiḥ dakṣaiḥ prabhūtī pūruṣatvatā

original: RV_04.054.03.2 deveṣu ca savitar mānuṣeṣu ca tvaṃ no atra suvatād anāgasaḥ

original: RV_04.054.04.1 na pramiye savitur daivyasya tad yathā viśvam bhuvanaṃ dhārayiṣyati

original: RV_04.054.04.2 yat pṛthivyā varimann ā svaṅgurir varṣman divaḥ suvati satyam asya tat

original: RV_04.054.05.1 indrajyeṣṭhān bṛhadbhyaḥ parvatebhyaḥ kṣayāṃ ebhyaḥ suvasi pastyāvataḥ

original: RV_04.054.05.2 yathā-yathā patayanto viyemira evaiva tasthuḥ savitaḥ savāya te
analyzed: yathā yathā patayantaḥ viyemire eva eva tasthuḥ savitar savāya te

original: RV_04.054.06.1 ye te trir ahan savitaḥ savāso dive-dive saubhagam āsuvanti
analyzed: ye te tris ahan savitar savāsaḥ dive dive saubhagam āsuvanti

original: RV_04.054.06.2 indro dyāvāpṛthivī sindhur adbhir ādityair no aditiḥ śarma yaṃsat

original: RV_04.055.01.1 ko vas trātā vasavaḥ ko varūtā dyāvābhūmī adite trāsīthāṃ naḥ

original: RV_04.055.01.2 sahīyaso varuṇa mitra martāt ko vo 'dhvare varivo dhāti devāḥ
analyzed: sahīyasaḥ varuṇa mitra martāt kaḥ vaḥ dhvare varivaḥ dhāti devāḥ

original: RV_04.055.02.1 pra ye dhāmāni pūrvyāṇy arcān vi yad uchān viyotāro amūrāḥ
analyzed: pra ye dhāmāni pūrvyāṇi arcān vi yat uchān viyotāraḥ amūrāḥ

original: RV_04.055.02.2 vidhātāro vi te dadhur ajasrā ṛtadhītayo rurucanta dasmāḥ
analyzed: vidhātāraḥ vi te ajasrāḥ ṛta dhītayaḥ rurucanta dasmāḥ

original: RV_04.055.03.1 pra pastyām aditiṃ sindhum arkaiḥ svastim īḷe sakhyāya devīm
analyzed: pra pastyām aditim sindhum arkaiḥ svastim īḍe sakhyāya devīm

original: RV_04.055.03.2 ubhe yathā no ahanī nipāta uṣāsānaktā karatām adabdhe
analyzed: ubhe yathā naḥ ahanī nipātaḥ uṣāsānaktā karatām adabdhe

original: RV_04.055.04.1 vy aryamā varuṇaś ceti panthām iṣas patiḥ suvitaṃ gātum agniḥ
analyzed: vi aryamā varuṇaḥ ceti panthām iṣaḥ patiḥ suvitam gātum agniḥ

original: RV_04.055.04.2 indrāviṣṇū nṛvad u ṣu stavānā śarma no yantam amavad varūtham
analyzed: indrāviṣṇū nṛvat u su stavānā śarma naḥ yantam amavat varūtham

original: RV_04.055.05.1 ā parvatasya marutām avāṃsi devasya trātur avri bhagasya
analyzed: ā parvatasya marutām avāṃsi devasya trātuḥ avri bhagasya

original: RV_04.055.05.2 pāt patir janyād aṃhaso no mitro mitriyād uta na uruṣyet
analyzed: pāt patiḥ janyāt aṃhasaḥ naḥ mitraḥ mitriyāt uta naḥ uruṣyet

original: RV_04.055.06.1 nū rodasī ahinā budhnyena stuvīta devī apyebhir iṣṭaiḥ
analyzed: nu rodasī ahinā budhnyena stuvīta devī apyebhiḥ iṣṭaiḥ

original: RV_04.055.06.2 samudraṃ na saṃcaraṇe saniṣyavo gharmasvaraso nadyo apa vran
analyzed: samudram na saṃcaraṇe saniṣyavaḥ gharma svarasaḥ nadyaḥ apa vran

original: RV_04.055.07.1 devair no devy aditir ni pātu devas trātā trāyatām aprayuchan
analyzed: devaiḥ naḥ devī aditiḥ ni pātu devaḥ trātā trāyatām aprayuchan

original: RV_04.055.07.2 nahi mitrasya varuṇasya dhāsim arhāmasi pramiyaṃ sānv agneḥ
analyzed: nahi mitrasya varuṇasya dhāsim arhāmasi pramiyam sānū agneḥ

original: RV_04.055.08.1 agnir īśe vasavyasyāgnir mahaḥ saubhagasya
analyzed: agniḥ īśe vasavyasya agniḥ mahaḥ saubhagasya

original: RV_04.055.08.2 tāny asmabhyaṃ rāsate
analyzed: tāni asmabhyam rāsate

original: RV_04.055.09.1 uṣo maghony ā vaha sūnṛte vāryā puru
analyzed: uṣaḥ maghoni ā vaha sūnṛte vāryā puru

original: RV_04.055.09.2 asmabhyaṃ vājinīvati
analyzed: asmabhyam vājinīvati

original: RV_04.055.10.1 tat su naḥ savitā bhago varuṇo mitro aryamā
analyzed: tat su naḥ savitā bhagaḥ varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā

original: RV_04.055.10.2 indro no rādhasā gamat
analyzed: indraḥ naḥ rādhasā gamat

original: RV_04.056.01.1 mahī dyāvāpṛthivī iha jyeṣṭhe rucā bhavatāṃ śucayadbhir arkaiḥ

original: RV_04.056.01.2 yat sīṃ variṣṭhe bṛhatī viminvan ruvad dhokṣā paprathānebhir evaiḥ
analyzed: yat sīm variṣṭhe bṛhatī viminvan ruvat dhokṣā paprathānebhiḥ evaiḥ

original: RV_04.056.02.1 devī devebhir yajate yajatrair aminatī tasthatur ukṣamāṇe
analyzed: devī devebhiḥ yajate yajatraiḥ a minatī tasthatuḥ ukṣamāṇe

original: RV_04.056.02.2 ṛtāvarī adruhā devaputre yajñasya netrī śucayadbhir arkaiḥ
analyzed: ṛtāvarī adruhā deva putre yajñasya netrī śucayadbhiḥ arkaiḥ

original: RV_04.056.03.1 sa it svapā bhuvaneṣv āsa ya ime dyāvāpṛthivī jajāna
analyzed: saḥ id su apāḥ bhuvaneṣu āsa yaḥ ime dyāvāpṛthivī jajāna

original: RV_04.056.03.2 urvī gabhīre rajasī sumeke avaṃśe dhīraḥ śacyā sam airat
analyzed: urvī gabhīre rajasī sumeke a vaṃśe dhīraḥ śacyā sam airat

original: RV_04.056.04.1 nū rodasī bṛhadbhir no varūthaiḥ patnīvadbhir iṣayantī sajoṣāḥ
analyzed: nu rodasī bṛhadbhiḥ naḥ varūthaiḥ patnīvadbhiḥ iṣayantī sajoṣāḥ

original: RV_04.056.04.2 urūcī viśve yajate ni pātaṃ dhiyā syāma rathyaḥ sadāsāḥ
analyzed: urūcī viśve yajate ni pātam dhiyā syāma rathyaḥ sadāsāḥ

original: RV_04.056.05.1 pra vām mahi dyavī abhy upastutim bharāmahe
analyzed: pra vām mahi abhī upastutim bharāmahe

original: RV_04.056.05.2 śucī upa praśastaye
analyzed: śucī upa praśastaye

original: RV_04.056.06.1 punāne tanvā mithaḥ svena dakṣeṇa rājathaḥ
analyzed: punāne tanvā mithas svena dakṣeṇa rājathaḥ

original: RV_04.056.06.2 ūhyāthe sanād ṛtam
analyzed: ūhyāthe sanāt ṛtam

original: RV_04.056.07.1 mahī mitrasya sādhathas tarantī pipratī ṛtam
analyzed: mahī mitrasya sādhathaḥ tarantī pipratī ṛtam

original: RV_04.056.07.2 pari yajñaṃ ni ṣedathuḥ
analyzed: pari yajñam ni sedathuḥ

original: RV_04.057.01.1 kṣetrasya patinā vayaṃ hiteneva jayāmasi
analyzed: kṣetrasya patinā vayam hitena iva jayāmasi

original: RV_04.057.01.2 gām aśvam poṣayitnv ā sa no mṛḷātīdṛśe
analyzed: gām aśvam poṣayitnu ā sa naḥ mṛḷāti īdṛśe

original: RV_04.057.02.1 kṣetrasya pate madhumantam ūrmiṃ dhenur iva payo asmāsu dhukṣva

analyzed: madhuścutam ghṛtam iva su pūtam ṛtasya naḥ patayaḥ mṛḍayantu

original: RV_04.057.03.1 madhumatīr oṣadhīr dyāva āpo madhuman no bhavatv antarikṣam
analyzed: madhumatīḥ oṣadhīḥ dyāvaḥ āpaḥ madhumat naḥ bhavatu antarikṣam

original: RV_04.057.03.2 kṣetrasya patir madhumān no astv ariṣyanto anv enaṃ carema
analyzed: kṣetrasya patiḥ madhumān naḥ astu a riṣyantaḥ anu enam carema

original: RV_04.057.04.1 śunaṃ vāhāḥ śunaṃ naraḥ śunaṃ kṛṣatu lāṅgalam
analyzed: śunam vāhāḥ śunam naraḥ śunam kṛṣatu lāṅgalam

original: RV_04.057.04.2 śunaṃ varatrā badhyantāṃ śunam aṣṭrām ud iṅgaya
analyzed: śunam varatrāḥ badhyantām śunam aṣṭrām ud iṅgaya

original: RV_04.057.05.1 śunāsīrāv imāṃ vācaṃ juṣethāṃ yad divi cakrathuḥ payaḥ
analyzed: śunāsīrau imām vācam juṣethām yat divi cakrathuḥ payaḥ

original: RV_04.057.05.2 tenemām upa siñcatam
analyzed: tena imām upa siñcatam

original: RV_04.057.06.1 arvācī subhage bhava sīte vandāmahe tvā
analyzed: arvācī subhage bhava sīte vandāmahe tvā

original: RV_04.057.06.2 yathā naḥ subhagāsasi yathā naḥ suphalāsasi
analyzed: yathā naḥ subhagā asasi yathā naḥ su phalā asasi

original: RV_04.057.07.1 indraḥ sītāṃ ni gṛhṇātu tām pūṣānu yachatu
analyzed: indraḥ sītām ni gṛhṇātu tām pūṣā anu yacchatu

original: RV_04.057.07.2 sā naḥ payasvatī duhām uttarām-uttarāṃ samām
analyzed: sā naḥ payasvatī duhām uttarām uttarām samām

original: RV_04.057.08.1 śunaṃ naḥ phālā vi kṛṣantu bhūmiṃ śunaṃ kīnāśā abhi yantu vāhaiḥ
analyzed: śunam naḥ phālāḥ vi kṛṣantu bhūmim śunam kīnāśāḥ abhi yantu vāhaiḥ

original: RV_04.057.08.2 śunam parjanyo madhunā payobhiḥ śunāsīrā śunam asmāsu dhattam
analyzed: śunam parjanyaḥ madhunā payobhiḥ śunāsīrā śunam asmāsu dhattam

original: RV_04.058.01.1 samudrād ūrmir madhumāṃ ud ārad upāṃśunā sam amṛtatvam ānaṭ
analyzed: samudrāt ūrmiḥ madhumān ud ārat upāṃśunā sam amṛta tvam ānaṭ

original: RV_04.058.01.2 ghṛtasya nāma guhyaṃ yad asti jihvā devānām amṛtasya nābhiḥ
analyzed: ghṛtasya nāma guhyam yat asti jihvā devānām amṛtasya nābhiḥ

original: RV_04.058.02.1 vayaṃ nāma pra bravāmā ghṛtasyāsmin yajñe dhārayāmā namobhiḥ
analyzed: vayam nāma pra bravāma ghṛtasya asmin yajñe dhārayāma namobhiḥ

original: RV_04.058.02.2 upa brahmā śṛṇavac chasyamānaṃ catuḥśṛṅgo 'vamīd gaura etat
analyzed: upa brahmā śṛṇavat śasyamānam catur śṛṅgaḥ vamīt gauraḥ etat

original: RV_04.058.03.1 catvāri śṛṅgā trayo asya pādā dve śīrṣe sapta hastāso asya
analyzed: catvāri śṛṅgā trayaḥ asya pādāḥ dve śīrṣe sapta hastāsaḥ asya

original: RV_04.058.03.2 tridhā baddho vṛṣabho roravīti maho devo martyāṃ ā viveśa
analyzed: tridhā baddhaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ roravīti mahaḥ devaḥ martyān ā viveśa

original: RV_04.058.04.1 tridhā hitam paṇibhir guhyamānaṃ gavi devāso ghṛtam anv avindan
analyzed: tridhā hitam paṇibhiḥ guhyamānam gavi devāsaḥ ghṛtam anu avindan

original: RV_04.058.04.2 indra ekaṃ sūrya ekaṃ jajāna venād ekaṃ svadhayā niṣ ṭatakṣuḥ
analyzed: indraḥ ekam sūryaḥ ekam jajāna venāt ekam svadhayā niḥ tatakṣuḥ

original: RV_04.058.05.1 etā arṣanti hṛdyāt samudrāc chatavrajā ripuṇā nāvacakṣe
analyzed: etāḥ arṣanti hṛdyāt samudrāt śata vrajāḥ ripuṇā na avacakṣe

original: RV_04.058.05.2 ghṛtasya dhārā abhi cākaśīmi hiraṇyayo vetaso madhya āsām
analyzed: ghṛtasya dhārāḥ abhi cākaśīmi hiraṇyayaḥ vetasaḥ madhye āsām

original: RV_04.058.06.1 samyak sravanti sarito na dhenā antar hṛdā manasā pūyamānāḥ
analyzed: samyak sravanti saritaḥ na dhenāḥ antar hṛdā manasā pūyamānāḥ

original: RV_04.058.06.2 ete arṣanty ūrmayo ghṛtasya mṛgā iva kṣipaṇor īṣamāṇāḥ
analyzed: ete arṣanti ūrmayaḥ ghṛtasya mṛgāḥ iva kṣipaṇoḥ īṣamāṇāḥ

original: RV_04.058.07.1 sindhor iva prādhvane śūghanāso vātapramiyaḥ patayanti yahvāḥ
analyzed: sindhoḥ iva prādhvane śūghanāsaḥ vātapramiyaḥ patayanti yahvāḥ

original: RV_04.058.07.2 ghṛtasya dhārā aruṣo na vājī kāṣṭhā bhindann ūrmibhiḥ pinvamānaḥ
analyzed: ghṛtasya dhārāḥ aruṣaḥ na vājī kāṣṭhāḥ bhindan ūrmibhiḥ pinvamānaḥ

original: RV_04.058.08.1 abhi pravanta samaneva yoṣāḥ kalyāṇyaḥ smayamānāso agnim
analyzed: abhi samanā iva yoṣāḥ kalyāṇyaḥ smayamānāsaḥ agnim

original: RV_04.058.08.2 ghṛtasya dhārāḥ samidho nasanta tā juṣāṇo haryati jātavedāḥ
analyzed: ghṛtasya dhārāḥ samidhaḥ nasanta tāḥ juṣāṇaḥ haryati jātavedāḥ

original: RV_04.058.09.1 kanyā iva vahatum etavā u añjy añjānā abhi cākaśīmi
analyzed: kanyāḥ iva vahatum etavai u añjī añjānāḥ abhi cākaśīmi

original: RV_04.058.09.2 yatra somaḥ sūyate yatra yajño ghṛtasya dhārā abhi tat pavante
analyzed: yatra somaḥ sūyate yatra yajñaḥ ghṛtasya dhārāḥ abhi tat pavante

original: RV_04.058.10.1 abhy arṣata suṣṭutiṃ gavyam ājim asmāsu bhadrā draviṇāni dhatta
analyzed: abhi arṣata suṣṭutim gavyam ājim asmāsu bhadrā draviṇāni dhatta

original: RV_04.058.10.2 imaṃ yajñaṃ nayata devatā no ghṛtasya dhārā madhumat pavante
analyzed: imam yajñam nayata devatāḥ naḥ ghṛtasya dhārāḥ madhumat pavante

original: RV_04.058.11.1 dhāman te viśvam bhuvanam adhi śritam antaḥ samudre hṛdy antar āyuṣi
analyzed: dhāman te viśvam bhuvanam adhi śritam antar samudre hṛdi antar āyuṣi

original: RV_04.058.11.2 apām anīke samithe ya ābhṛtas tam aśyāma madhumantaṃ ta ūrmim
analyzed: apām anīke samithe yaḥ ābhṛtaḥ tam aśyāma madhumantam te ūrmim
